comments.body: is this comment about `MLFLOW_TRACKING_URI` still accurate?
yeah. maybe it would be less confusing if it said `MLFLOW_REGISTRY_URI` ?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@# NOTE: in contrast to tracking, we do not support the following ways to specify
# the model registry URI:
#  - via environment variables like MLFLOW_TRACKING_URI, MLFLOW_TRACKING_USERNAME, ...
# We do support specifying it
#  - via the ``model_registry_uri`` parameter when creating an ``MlflowClient`` or
